actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to grant aliens of Vietnam, Cambodia, or Laos, who are presently in the United States on student visas, status as permanent residents of the United States.

summary.text: Grants to aliens of Vietnam, Cambodia, or Laos, who are presently in the United States on student visas, status as permanent residents of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act. States that such status changes shall not be charged against immigration quotas.

titles.title: A bill to grant aliens of Vietnam, Cambodia, or Laos, who are presently in the United States on student visas, status as permanent residents of the United States.
